vision.title: Vision
vision.paragraph1: コードを書くことは、構造をデザインすること。人が使いやすく、AIが理解しやすいインターフェースを作ることを目的としています。
vision.paragraph2: 技術と感性の境界で「意味が通る設計」を探求し、見た目だけでなく、データや言語の構造まで意識した開発を行っています。

hero.name: Kaisei Yasuzaki
hero.description: Based in Sapporo, Japan. I specialize in web development and structural design using Next.js, WordPress, and Tailwind CSS. My focus is on harmonizing design and meaning, working in the intersection between practical implementation and conceptual thought.

projects.name: AI Visualization Project
projects.description: A React tool that visualizes ChatGPT's reasoning structure using Three.js.

projects.name: WordPress Theme: "Semplice Clone"
projects.description: Responsive LP built with a custom theme. Lightweight design with a Z-shaped layout.

vision.title: Vision
vision.paragraph1: Writing code means designing structure. My goal is to create interfaces that are easy for humans to use and intuitive for AI to understand.
vision.paragraph2: Exploring the boundary between technology and sensibility, I focus on meaningful design — development that considers not only appearance but also data and linguistic structures.
